TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SqlWorkflowPersistenceService extends System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.WorkflowPersistenceService implements class System.Workflow.Runtime.IPendingWork
Public Class SqlWorkflowPersistenceService Inherits WorkflowPersistenceService Implements IPendingWork

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Workflow.* types are deprecated. Instead, please use the new types from System.Activities.*")

summary.span: 表示一种持久性服务，该服务使用 SQL 数据库存储工作流状态信息。

span.span: Represents a persistence service that uses a SQL database to store workflow state information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 类表示功能完全的持久性服务。The class represents a fully-functional persistence service. 您可以使用这一现成可用的服务，在工作流运行时引擎请求时，保留和检索关于工作流实例的工作流状态信息。You can use this service out-of-box to persist and retrieve workflow state information about a workflow instance when requested to by the workflow runtime engine. 会参与 所提供的工作流事务批处理功能。The participates in the workflow transaction batching functionality provided by the . 也就是说，它会将表示 SQL 数据库挂起写入的对象添加到 并实现 接口。That is, it adds objects that represent pending writes to the SQL database to the and implements the interface. 支持工作流实例的锁定。The supports locking of workflow instances. 此功能用于几个工作流运行时共享同一个数据库的情况。This feature is used when several workflow runtimes share the same database. 只要工作流运行时使用了某个工作流实例，SQL 数据库表中的列就会将该工作流实例标记为锁定。A column in the SQL database table is used to mark a workflow instance as locked whenever it is being used by a workflow runtime. 不会加载被另一个运行时标记为“使用中”的工作流实例。The does not load a workflow instance that is marked as "in use" by another runtime. 通常，当保留（如空闲、完成或终止）工作流实例时，会释放这些锁定。Typically these locks are released when the workflow instance is persisted, for example, on idle, completion, or termination. 另外，在非活动状态持续一段时间后，也可能会自动释放这些锁定。The locks can also be released automatically after a period of inactivity. 使用 类的构造函数，可以设置此非活动的时间期限。This period of inactivity can be set using the constructor of the class. 还可通过配置文件对其进行设置。It can also be set through the configuration file. 有关详细持久性服务一般情况下，请参阅类。For more information about persistence services in general, see the class. 例如，如果工作流实例具有 ，则它们可以包含计时器。Workflow instances can contain timers, for example, if they have a . 对于包含计时器的工作流， 记录此工作流的下一个计时器过期的时间。For workflows that contain timers, the records the time when the workflow's next timer expires. 会定期轮询数据库，查找计时器已过期的工作流。The periodically polls the database, looking for workflows whose timers have expired. 轮询间隔的频率可以使用 构造函数或配置文件进行设置。The frequency of the polling interval can be set using the constructor or using a configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 如果在工作流应用程序中同时使用 和 ，建议为持久性和跟踪使用单一数据库。When using both the and the in a workflow application, it is recommended to use a single database for both persistence and tracking.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当工作流运行时引擎从应用程序配置文件加载服务时，会调用此构造函数。This constructor is invoked when the workflow runtime engine loads services from an application configuration file. 也可以使用 `NameValueCollection` 参数以编程的方式调用该构造函数。It can also be programmatically invoked with the `NameValueCollection` parameter. 有效参数为 `ConnectionString`、`OwnershipTimeoutSeconds`、`UnloadOnIdle` 和 `EnableRetries`。The valid parameters are `ConnectionString`, `OwnershipTimeoutSeconds`, `UnloadOnIdle`, and `EnableRetries`. 如果参数包含其他任何键，则会引发 。An is thrown if parameters contain any other keys.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 请注意，使用此构造函数（为 `instanceOwnershipDuration` 提供值）将启用锁定。Note that using this constructor (which provides a value for `instanceOwnershipDuration`) enables locking. 若要创建不会启用锁定的持久性服务，请使用另一个不会指定 `instanceOwnershipDuration` 的构造函数。To create a persistence service that does not enable locking, use a different constructor that does not specify `instanceOwnershipDuration`.

public: property bool EnableRetries { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取和设置一个值，该值指定 是否将重试提交工作批次。

span.span: Gets and sets a value that specifies whether the retries committing a work batch.

value.span: 如果服务应重试提交工作批次，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the service should retry committing the work batch; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无法批处理以下工作项，而且任何事务重试都必须通过 `EnableRetries` 属性进行处理：The following work items cannot be batched and any transaction retries must be handled through the `EnableRetries` property: - 轮询以查找过期的数据库计时器。Polling for expired database timers. - 加载工作流实例状态。Loading workflow instance states. - 在工作流运行时引擎启动时重新加载工作流实例。Reloading workflow instances when the workflow run-time engine starts. - 调用 。Calling . 除了以编程方式进行设置外，还可以通过配置文件启用此功能。Besides being set programmatically, this functionality can be enabled through a configuration file. 有关如何通过配置文件设置此属性的详细信息，请参阅[工作流配置文件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909)。For more information about how to set this property through a configuration file, see [Workflow Configuration Files](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ada4bb90-6c9d-4f3d-a9d0-b559bb0f9909). 有关重试工作批次事务的常规信息，请参阅[批处理中工作流的状态信息](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d)。For general information about retrying work batch transactions, see [Batching State Information in Workflows](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ecda18ba-9140-4bd7-b13d-6787fdf5959d).

remarks.format: ## Remarks `rootActivity` 会进行序列化并写入 中。`rootActivity` is serialized and written to the . 现成可用的 会实现工作流实例状态的锁定。The out-of-box implements locking of the workflow instance state. 用户必须在构造函数中配置 `instanceOwnershipDuration` 参数。The user must configure the `instanceOwnershipDuration` parameter in the constructor. 此值将决定主机可以锁定实例的时间间隔。This value decides the time interval during which the instance can be locked by a host. 如果多台主机共享相同的持久性服务和数据库，而另一台主机尝试在此间隔期间加载实例，则会发生 。If multiple hosts share the same persistence service and database, and another host tries to load the instance during this interval, a occurs. 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class.

summary.span: 解除对指定工作流实例状态访问的锁定。

span.span: Unlocks access to the specified workflow instance state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作流运行时使用此方法，在数据存储区中对工作流实例状态进行解锁而不进行保留；如果运行时必须对此状态进行解锁而不进行保留（如在 的情况下），工作流运行时将调用此方法。This method is used by the workflow runtime to unlock a workflow instance state in the data store without persistence and is called by the workflow runtime if the runtime must unlock the state without persisting, for example, in the case of an .
